item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>Matthew, it's really cool getting your news from wherever you are. I hope it's as easy elsewhere on your travels but I fear that the world is not yet a wireless network. Keep having a good time Fi</p>
item.content:encoded: Matthew, it’s really cool getting your news from wherever you are. I hope it’s as easy elsewhere on your travels but I fear that the world is not yet a wireless network. Keep having a good time Fi
